props.name: id
props.description: A unique identifier for the icon toggle

props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute of the icon toggle

props.name: value
props.description: The value attribute of the icon toggle

props.name: model
props.description: The model that the icon toggle value syncs to

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the icon toggle label and can contain HTML

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatched when the icon toggle is changed
